response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $800,000 to us due to its unique features, unparalleled craftsmanship, and the significant investment we've made in research and development. Considering its extraordinary attributes, we kindly propose a purchase price of $750,000. We believe this offer presents an excellent opportunity for both parties to benefit. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 750000}
